name: The Other (Deathbed)
description:
1964. The Ross Sea, Antartica. 

After responding to a distress call from the ice locked and lifeless RRS Shackleton, unsettling events have occurred aboard your vessel. 

Now, six survivors scramble for refuge in the deathly Shackleton, certain of only one thing: one of their crewmates is not who, or what they appear to be.

Play as one of a doomed crew, doing anything to survive starvation and the suspicions of their crewmates. Explore and search for resources for the group, whilst protecting those who trust you.

To play the game you must avoid starving by finding enough rations in the rooms around the ship to keep your condition above zero. You must survive until only two of you are left.

Other crewmates will trust and suspect you based on your actions. You must end up with someone who trusts you to have any chance of survival.
